General.Name: ButOne Information Corp XiAn
General.Description: But'one Information Corporation,Xi'an engages in the education and information technology businesses in China. The company operates Xi'an Jiaotong University City College that provides higher education; and Xi'an Jiaotong University, a college at the undergraduate level. It is also involved in the research and development of enterprise application software, computer hardware, and system integration; and monitoring design and construction business. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Xi'an, China.
